title.rendered: It was very personal: Rohit Sharma on what message he passed to Pujara through Ishan

content.rendered:
On being asked about what message he passed to Cheteshwar Pujara through Ishan Kishan during the Indore Test in the viral video, Team India captain Rohit Sharma said,

“That’s quite personal. Very very personal stuff.”

He added,

“It was nothing to do with the game…If it was a tactical thing, I would’ve told you definitely.”

Read More: Australia enters the World Test Championship Final, India still to enter

excerpt.rendered: On being asked about what message he passed to Cheteshwar Pujara through Ishan Kishan during the Indore Test in the viral video, Team India captain Rohit Sharma said, “That’s quite personal. Very very personal stuff.” He added, “It was nothing to do with the game…If it was a tactical thing, I would’ve told you definitely.” […]
